mapper.select:
select id from meta_segmentation where 1=1
and `name` in #{item}

SELECT mps.id,mps.`name`,mps.segmentation_logo,count(*) ct FROM investment_institutions_project iip left join project_financing_log pfl on iip.project_id = pfl.id left join projects p on pfl.project_id = p.id right join project_segmentation ps on p.id = ps.project_id left join meta_segmentation mps on ps.segmentation_name = mps.`name` where iip.investment_institutions_id = #{institutionId} and pfl.financing_time between "2017-01-01" and "2017-12-31" group by ps.segmentation_name order by ct desc limit 0,9

SELECT ms.id,ms.`name`,ms.segmentation_logo,count(*) cot FROM investors inr left join investor_demand id on inr.user_id = id.userid right join investor_demand_segmentation ids on id.id = ids.investor_demand_id left join meta_segmentation ms on ids.segmentation = ms.`name` where investment_institutions_id = #{institutionId} group by ids.segmentation
